title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for May 16
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for May 16
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010David Wilson\u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing his "Stock of the Day" Etsy (ETSY). Etsy Inc.'s shares are headed for their biggest since July 2015 after a couple of investors disclosed a combined 8 percent stake and indicated that the online arts-and-crafts be sold. The shares were bought by the private-equity firm TPG and the hedge-fund manager Dragoneer Investment Group, which said they would talk with the company about strategic options. Etsy said in response that it's reviewing current plans and will look at alternatives.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
